text:
Arachnys | Software Engineer | London UK, Vienna AT | ONSITE https://www.arachnys.com/jobs

Arachnys helps banks onboard and manage customers better by automating expensive manual KYC, AML and due diligence tasks. We sell to some of the world's largest organizations.

Our close-knit development team sits in London with an outpost in Vienna. We work on fun problems in search over big indexes (Hadoop/ElasticSearch), entity relationships (Dgraph/Neo4j), and other goodies.

Email us at jobs@arachnys.com with a link to public code to apply.
